responses: Hello, how can I help you?
Good to see you again! What is your question?
Hi there, how can I help?
I'm Bonita Applebum, apples turn me on! What would you like to know about the batch?
I'm yum yum, Bonita Applebum. Ask me anything about them apples.
Sad to see you go :(
Talk to you later
Goodbye!
Bum bum, Bonita Applebum
An apple a day, keeps the doctor away

patterns: How has the batch been qualified?

patterns: How many normal apples are in the batch?

responses: There are (appleScore) normal apples in this batch

patterns: How many blotch apples are in the batch?

responses: There are (blotchApple) blotch apples in this batch
The batch contains (blotchApple) apples with blotch, this is (blotchPercentage)% of the batch.

patterns: Which amount of apples has rot?

responses: In (rotApple) apples rot was found in this batch

In this batch exactly (rotApple) apples with rot were detected.

patterns: How many apples in the batch are rejected?

responses: The batch has been rejected.
The batch is completely unsuitable and will be composted.

With (rotApple) rotten, (blotchApple) blotched and (scabApple) scabbed apples, a total of (rejectedPercentage)% damage makes the batch completely unsuitable for consumption or further processing.
